pages.text: $(b)Dusts$() are essential alchemy components. They're created using the $(violet)Mortar and Pestle$().
Grind bones into $(violet)Bone Dust$() using the mortar and pestle.
Grind amethyst shards into $(violet)Amethyst Dust$() using the mortar and pestle.

pages.text: $(b)Void Essence$()$(br2)A rare material obtained from the void. Used in advanced alchemy recipes.$(br2)$(violet)Dropped by Void Wisps or found in special locations.$()
